Text: Why didn't I find this earlier?  I've been living in a Spanish-speaking country for five years now and I still can't speak Spanish.  I'm sure this miracle tutorial will have me speaking Spanish a week from now.

Excellent. Really supplements my learning.

Bit heavy on the grammatical like subjunctive etc. Many people don't even know what these things are in their own [native] language! Just a minor niggle but otherwise excellent and thank you.
